entities.name: veritas serum
entities.description: The potion that allows the drinker to become a double of someone else, mentioned in the text as 'Moody's double'.

entities.name: moody's trunk
entities.description: A magical trunk belonging to Moody, used to store his belongings and later used to imprison him.

entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: The person who arrived at the scene to sort out the Muggles who had heard a disturbance.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: A group of non-magical people who were present in the yard and heard the disturbance.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school where the narrator is heading with Moody's trunk and belongings.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person mentioned as someone who needs to be fooled by the narrator.

relationships.description: The potion contains Moody's hair, which is used to make it.
The potion also contains boomslang skin, stolen from the dungeons.
Moody is imprisoned in his own magical trunk.
The trunk also contains Moody's dark detectors.
Moody's clothes are packed in the trunk along with him.
